🔒 Introducing Krivo: Your Ultimate Privacy Companion

Pronounced "kree:vo," Krivo is derived from the Greek word meaning "to hide."

With Krivo, you have the power to blur out any sensitive information from any website or web app with ease. Whether you're delivering demos, recording videos, or simply browsing the web, Krivo ensures that your data remains confidential and secure.

Use Cases 🛡️
🔐 Privacy Protection: Have you ever taken a screenshot or recorded a demo just to find out that OOPSIES it contains sensitive data, like emails, phone numbers, names, photos, or any sensitive customer data you can think of.
🚀🌟✨ Marketing: Blurring out portions of content can be used to provide previews while still encouraging users to access the full content. For example, blurring out the text of premium articles on a news website or the details of products in an e-commerce store can entice users to subscribe or click through to view the complete content.

🤩 Why Choose Krivo?

👉 Easy to Use: Simply install the Krivo extension, and with just a few clicks, you can blur out any sensitive information on your screen.

🔄 Versatile: Krivo works seamlessly across all websites and web apps, giving you full control over what you choose to hide.

🔐 Privacy First: Your privacy is our top priority. Krivo is committed to safeguarding your data. We do not collect any user data, nor do we store or sell any user data to marketers. With Krivo, you can trust that your information remains secure and confidential at all times.
